analysis.description:
ChronosCore.play (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#514-616) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(wagerPrize) (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#580)

ChronosBase.canStart (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#323-349) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeOfWeek >= activeTimesFrom[i] && timeOfWeek <= activeTimesTo[i] (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#345-348)

ChronosCore._processGameEnd (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#665-703) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= lastWagerTimeoutTimestamp (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#670-674)
ChronosBase.nthWagerPrizeN should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#321)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#84-94) should be declared external
Claimable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#117-119) should be declared external
Claimable.claimOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#121-131) should be declared external

ERC20.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#193-199) should be declared external
ERC20.approve (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#199-200) should be declared external
PullPayment.withdrawPayments (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cd02516d58ebaef8dce063fee284a3c47a737e8.sol#407-417) should be declared external
